Name: Vugluskr: Zombie Rampage
About the game: Player fantasy - SWAT meets zombies in Sanctuary environments. • Fight against zombies, spider mutants & evil soldiers. • Use different automatic rifles or frag grenades to defeat enemies. • 9 fantastic medieval levels day and night time. • Collect crystals to activate ZIP lines. • Travel at ZIP lines to hidden level areas. • Open treasure chests to collect keys. • Find and open an exit from the level. • Interact with other SWAT members. • Read diaries and reveal the root cause of infection. • Enjoy unreal engine-powered 3d graphics: 2K textures, lights & shadows, visual and sound effects. • Have fun. Input mapping [W][A][S][D] - Movement [E] - Interaction (ZIP-lines traveling, dairies reading, talking to SWAT) [G] - Frag grenade [F] - Flashlight [P] - Game pause [R] - Reload [1] - Primary weapon [2] - Secondary weapon [Space] - Jump [Shift] - Sprint [Left mouse button] - third-person person view firing [Right mouse button] - first-person view firing [TAB] - Switch between third-person/first-person person view [Esc] - Quit the game
